description.info: Successfully finished yearly Machine Learning priorities for the organization 4 months ahead of schedule
A beautiful pupper came to my life. He had a Dobby like face, so we called him Dobby!
I became the lead Machine Learning Developer at my organization! Fancy title, right?
I published my fist Alexa Skill called Pi Number Upto Thousand Decimals, I received a free Hoodie from Amazon for it!
I started my first fulltime job as a developer at Invistics Corporation!
Received a Letter of Recommendation from my Statistics professor for being an outstanding student! Class rank: 7/56. You can check it out at my LinkedIn profile!
Graduated with a Master's in Computer Science from the University of Florida, Gainesville, Florida. GPA 3.86/4, proud! Woo-hoo!!
